page.title: 11HOUSING.
page.content: { Clifton and Leeman Rd area.}We went to Clifton and saw very big terraced house streets.They are Victorian and Edwardian:Bootham Terr.,Lincoln St., Forth St., Jubilee Terr.and Water End.We found semi-detached houses which are two houses joined together. Longfield Terrace and Chudleigh Road are a mixture of terraced and semis. Detached houses are not very common in Leeman Rd.The Leeman Rd area is like a village within the city of York bounded by the river and the railway. { Acomb}is a large residential suburb of the city and is about two miles west of the City Centre.As well as a large private housing estate there are three large council estates. On one of these are many prefabs built soon after the Second World War in 1946-47.
